title: Appointment mandatory for passport services
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Immigration and Emigration informed the public to obtain prior appointments before visiting Department to apply for Passports under one day and normal service with effect from 17th May 2022.
However, it has been observed that a large number of clients visit to obtain services without making a prior appointment, said the department.
The Department of Immigration and Emigration said services will be provided only to the applicants who have made prior appointment under one day and normal services to obtain passports.
The inconvenience caused to public who visit without obtaining prior appointments is unavoidable.
Appointments can be made by visiting the website http://www.immigration.gov.lk/ or contact number 070-7101-060.
Journalist Dharshana Handungoda summoned to CID, Lawyers question why no official communication was made
SLPP MPs Sanath Nishantha, Milan Jayathilake moved to court from remand custody
